arguments.query: devops solutions automation azure pipeline github ci/cd
devops solutions automation azure pipeline github ci/cd.

  "reasoning": "The query focuses on DevOps automation using Azure pipelines, GitHub, and CI/CD. The most relevant items are certifications and exams that cover DevOps engineering, Azure DevOps solutions, and GitHub administration/automation. The Microsoft Certified: DevOps Engineer Expert certification and its corresponding AZ‑400 exam directly address designing and implementing Azure DevOps pipelines and CI/CD. GitHub‑related certifications (Administration, Advanced Security, Foundations, Copilot, Actions) cover source control, security, and workflow automation on GitHub, which is part of CI/CD pipelines. These items are ranked by relevance, with the DevOps Engineer and AZ‑400 exam at the top, followed by the GitHub certifications.",

{
  "reasoning": "The query is focused on DevOps automation using Azure Pipelines and GitHub for CI/CD. Among the catalog items, only the learning path titled \"Application lifecycle management for the Power Platform\" mentions DevOps in its subjects and includes modules on GitHub Actions, aligning with the CI/CD aspect of the query. While it is centered on the Power Platform, the DevOps concepts and GitHub integration make it the most relevant item. The other two items (Power Pages administration and Azure Health Data Services) do not address DevOps, Azure Pipelines, or CI/CD, and are therefore excluded.",
  "learningPaths": [
    {
      "summary": "Application lifecycle management (ALM) is important as the applications your organization builds becomes more complex and as more of your company depends on their stability. ALM is not a one size fits all concept, it can vary from organization to organization and even within based on the type of solution being built. This learning path can help you with ALM best practices.",
      "levels": [
        "intermediate"
      ],
      "roles": [
        "developer",
        "functional-consultant"
      ],

        "power-platform"
      ],

arguments.query: Azure DevOps solutions pipelines github ci/cd foundational and advanced topics
application lifecycle management GitHub Actions Power Platform

contents.result:
{
 "reasoning": "The query combines three concepts: application lifecycle management (ALM), GitHub Actions, and Power Platform. Among the provided catalog items, only two modules touch on any of these topics. The \"Perform common actions with client script in Power Platform\" module is directly related to the Power Platform, making it the most relevant. The \"Become a Microsoft Learn contributor\" module involves contributing via GitHub, which aligns with the GitHub Actions/ALM aspect, though it does not specifically cover Power Platform. The other modules are unrelated to the query. Therefore, these two modules are returned, ordered by relevance.",
  "modules": [
    {
      "summary": "The goal of this module is to review how to achieve common user experience automation procedures through Client Script. This module is intended to serve as a practical guide for how to solve real-world scenarios that are frequently encountered during Microsoft Power Platform implementations.",
      "levels": ["intermediate"],
      "roles": ["functional-consultant", "developer"],
      "products": ["power-platform", "power-apps", "dataverse"],
      "subjects": ["custom-app-development"],
      "id": "learn-bizapps.actions-client-script-power-platform",

contents.text: {"rationale":"Based on the student's interest in DevOps solutions, CI/CD, Azure Pipelines, and GitHub automation, the selected learning path and supplementary modules provide the closest match to foundational and practical DevOps skills within the Power Platform and GitHub environments. The certifications and exam highlight recognized paths to DevOps expertise, with the AZ-400 exam and Microsoft DevOps Engineer Expert certification considered the industry standard for Azure DevOps professionals. While some content is tied to the Power Platform, it is the most relevant path available in Microsoft Learn and introduces transferable DevOps practices and GitHub integration.","learningPaths":[{"title":"Application lifecycle management for the Power Platform","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/application-lifecycle-management/","estimatedHours":2,"relevance":"This learning path introduces application lifecycle management (ALM) concepts, including DevOps automation and best practices with GitHub Actions. Although it has a Power Platform focus, it covers core principles and tools (like source control, CI/CD, automation, and collaboration) that are foundational for DevOps workflows in Azure and GitHub environments, directly supporting the student's DevOps skill goals."}],"modules":[{"title":"Perform common actions with client script in Power Platform","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/actions-client-script-power-platform/","skillFocus":"Strengthens automation and scripting within Power Platform projects—useful for custom DevOps workflows."},{"title":"Become a Microsoft Learn contributor","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/become-learn-contributor/","skillFocus":"Reinforces the understanding of collaborative workflows using GitHub, which is essential for modern DevOps teams."}],"targets":[{"title":"Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions (Exam AZ-400)","type":"Exam","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/exams/az-400/"},{"title":"Microsoft Certified: DevOps Engineer Expert","type":"Certification","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/devops-engineer/"},{"title":"GitHub Administration","type":"Certification","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/github-administration/"},{"title":"GitHub Advanced Security","type":"Certification","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/github-advanced-security/"},{"title":"GitHub Foundations","type":"Certification","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/github-foundations/"},{"title":"GitHub Copilot","type":"Certification","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/github-copilot/"},{"title":"GitHub Actions","type":"Certification","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/github-actions/"}]}
